original_text: The bronze from the two pillars, the Sea and the twelve bronze bulls under it, and the movable stands, which King Solomon had made for the temple of the Lord, was more than could be weighed.
korean_text: 솔로몬 왕이 여호와의 성전을 위하여 만든 두 기둥과 한 바다와 그 받침 아래에 있는 열두 놋 소 곧 이 모든 기구의 놋 무게는 헤아릴 수 없었더라

sentences.original_text: The bronze from the two pillars
the Sea and the twelve bronze bulls under it
sentences.korean_translation: 바다와 그 아래 열두 청동 소들

sentences.original_text: which King Solomon had made for the temple of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬 왕이 주의 성전을 위해 만들었던 것들

sentences.original_text: was more than could be weighed
sentences.korean_translation: 무게를 다 잴 수 없을 정도였다
